mapper.insert: insert into tradition_award (id, issue_no, status, lottery_type, award_num, prize_detail, lost, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{issueNo}, #{status}, #{lotteryType}, #{awardNum}, #{prizeDetail}, #{lost}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update tradition_award
id = #{id},
issue_no = #{issueNo},
status = #{status},
lottery_type = #{lotteryType},
award_num = #{awardNum},
prize_detail = #{prizeDetail},
lost = #{lost},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id};
